items.title: Spirit AeroSystems plans furloughs at Kansas facility
items.description: Financial concerns continue for the Boeing and Airbus supplier as it will temporarily lay off up to 350 workers at its Wichita plant.

items.title: Elon Musk’s SpaceX Is a Big Winner From Trump’s Budget Proposal
items.description: Elon Musk’s SpaceX Is a Big Winner From Trump’s Budget Proposal

items.title: Trump’s NASA Nominee Backs Funding Method That Benefitted SpaceX
items.description: (Bloomberg) -- Jared Isaacman, President Donald Trump’s pick for NASA chief, made history when he led the first all-civilian crew into space and completed the first commercial spacewalk. Now, the tech billionaire and CEO of Shift4 Payments is set to make his mark on the way the space agency finances its missions.Most Read from BloombergThe Battle Over the Fate of Detroit’s Renaissance CenterNYC Real Estate Industry Asks Judge to Block New Broker Fee LawNJ Transit Strike Would Be ‘Disaster’ for R
